shops. This worked well for Microsoft, Sony, and Nintendo because they didn't
have to deal with running a retail business; it was cost effective to just give
a cut to GME. The gaming console companies were effectively…

localize.title: 为什么Gamestop（GME）会成功地在网上销售游戏？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
当年Gamestop的商业模式是在实体店销售游戏
店。这对微软、索尼和任天堂来说效果很好，因为他们没有
必须处理经营零售业务，这是成本效益，只是给了。

localize.title: 爲什麼Gamestop（GME）會成功地在網上銷售遊戲？
localize.the_new_excerpt:

必須處理經營零售業務，這是成本效益，只是給了。
